title: Database Backup
description: Manage database backups, restore, and schedule.

list.title: Backup List
list.emptyDescription: Create your first backup to protect your data.

createModal.title: Create Backup
createModal.description: Create a full backup of all production databases. This may take a few minutes.
createModal.tagPlaceholder: Enter a note for this backup (optional)
createModal.tagHint: A brief description to identify this backup later.

deleteModal.title: Delete Backup
deleteModal.description: Are you sure you want to delete this backup? This action cannot be undone.
deleteModal.warning: Once deleted, this backup file will be permanently removed.

restoreModal.title: Restore Database
restoreModal.description: Are you sure you want to restore the database from this backup?
restoreModal.warning: ⚠️ This will overwrite the current database with the backup data. This operation cannot be undone.

info.maxBackups: Maximum 10 backups retained. Oldest backups are automatically removed.
info.autoBackup: Automatic backup runs on the last day of every month at 23:59:59.
info.fileFormat: Backups use PostgreSQL custom format for efficient storage and restore.
